content: The sloping path itself is lined with several Supporter Monks, but are thankfully slow to attack and allow you to charge up your focus points with light combos and unleash big hits before they can react.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'New_Thunderclap_Temple_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'New Thunderclap Temple Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Temple Entrance'.
The content is as follows:
The sloping path itself is lined with several Supporter Monks, but are thankfully slow to attack and allow you to charge up your focus points with light combos and unleash big hits before they can react.
